headline: The Best Warren Buffett Stocks to Buy With $1,000 Right Now
summary: Berkshire has a small position in a massive tech juggernaut that benefits from multiple growth tailwinds and competitive advantages.  Durable financial performance, a strong brand, and network effects are probably why this leading financial services entity is a top Buffett holding.  Warren Buffett-led Berkshire Hathaway owns many stocks in its huge $284 billion public equity portfolio.
